channel.title: Anime
channel.description:
What are some of your guys favorite anime series personally i LOVE bleach and the current arc is very entertaining. If i had to choose my second would probably be FMA even though they dont make no episodes (or so i believe).
discuss
PS:I know there have been other topics but im making a new one.

item.title: Anime
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:25, topic:410575”]IMO I hate Mainstream animes but I watch Naruto because it was the first anime that was introduced to me in Japanese with English subtitles. Dragonball Z was my first anime ever but I watch animes that people usually don’t ever hear about (in America at least).

Here is a list of animes that I have watched

Yumekui Merry Infinite Stratos Donpa Onna to Seishun Otoko Aria The Scarlet Ammo Kami Nomi zo Shiru sekai Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Case Closed - Detective series Sola Pokemon Best Wishes! - [Pokemon Black and White series] Working!! ToraDora Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Season 2 Code Geass Code Geass R2 Clannad Clannad After Story CLANNAD [The Visual Novel for PlayStation 2] Onegai Teacher Onegai Twins - Season 2 DragonBall DragonBall Z DragonBall GT DragonBall Kai Hayate No Gotoku! Hayate No Gotoku! Season 2 Full Metal Alchemist Full Metal Alchemist:Brotherhood Naruto Naruto Shippuuden K-ON! K-ON! Season 2 Lucky Star InuYasha InuYasha Season 2 Sumomo Momomo Bokatsu Tenshi Dokoro-chan Death Note Ouran High School Host Club Girls Bravo School Days Elfen Lied Boku no Futatsu no Tsubasa Sora No Otoshimono Sora No Otoshimono Kannagi Mahou Sensei Nagima! Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai 1/2 Prince Onidere Nyankoi! Moriguchi Orito no Teiougaku Girlfriend Occult Academy Kiss X Sis Neon Genesis Evangelion Gundam (1990's versions) Ah! My Goddess

As you all know, I am a track athlete, I have lots a friends, and I have a very loving girlfriend. I don’t think that makes Anime/Manga a “socially inept” hobby.[/quote]
I have seen most of those animes

Read full topic

item.title: Anime
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

IMO I hate Mainstream animes but I watch Naruto because it was the first anime that was introduced to me in Japanese with English subtitles. Dragonball Z was my first anime ever but I watch animes that people usually don’t ever hear about (in America at least).

Here is a list of animes that I have watched

Yumekui Merry Infinite Stratos Donpa Onna to Seishun Otoko Aria The Scarlet Ammo Kami Nomi zo Shiru sekai Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Case Closed - Detective series Sola Pokemon Best Wishes! - [Pokemon Black and White series] Working!! ToraDora Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Season 2 Code Geass Code Geass R2 Clannad Clannad After Story CLANNAD [The Visual Novel for PlayStation 2] Onegai Teacher Onegai Twins - Season 2 DragonBall DragonBall Z DragonBall GT DragonBall Kai Hayate No Gotoku! Hayate No Gotoku! Season 2 Full Metal Alchemist Full Metal Alchemist:Brotherhood Naruto Naruto Shippuuden K-ON! K-ON! Season 2 Lucky Star InuYasha InuYasha Season 2 Sumomo Momomo Bokatsu Tenshi Dokoro-chan Death Note Ouran High School Host Club Girls Bravo School Days Elfen Lied Boku no Futatsu no Tsubasa Sora No Otoshimono Sora No Otoshimono Kannagi Mahou Sensei Nagima! Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai 1/2 Prince Onidere Nyankoi! Moriguchi Orito no Teiougaku Girlfriend Occult Academy Kiss X Sis Neon Genesis Evangelion Gundam (1990's versions) Ah! My Goddess

As you all know, I am a track athlete, I have lots a friends, and I have a very loving girlfriend. I don’t think that makes Anime/Manga a “socially inept” hobby.

Read full topic

item.title: Anime
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

OmgItsShane:

Anime is fucking retarded go run track or some shit and get active then watching this junk.

Just because we watch Anime doesn’t mean we don’t have a life, watching Anime is like watching TV and episodes, and reality TV, it’s a episode and nothing different.

You have no reason to “flame” people about it.

Read full topic
